tool_description: Are you ready to unlock a world of career possibilities? Look no further! Our Job Posting API aggregates millions of job listings from over 100 countries since 2021. Whether you’re a developer building a job board, a data-driven intelligence platform, or a recruitment tool, our API provides you with a comprehensive view of the global job market.
name: Job Postings
title: Job Postings

api_list.name: /api/v2/Jobs/Latest
/api/v2/Jobs/{slug}
api_list.description: Once you have found your job from the search end point, you can use this endpoint to get more information about it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-postings1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/Jobs/principal-cloud-solutions-architect-4674"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-postings1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://job-postings1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/Jobs/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-postings1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v2/Jobs/Search
api_list.description: Provides the ability to do a full text search on all our jobs. All returned jobs are ordered from newest to oldest.
